trans-unit.source: Represents a control that enables a user to select a date by using a visual calendar display.
trans-unit.target: 代表一个控件，此控件允许用户使用可视的日历显示来选择日期。

trans-unit.source: A <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Calendar> control can be used on its own, or as a drop-down part of a <xref:System.Windows.Controls.DatePicker> control.
trans-unit.target: A<xref:System.Windows.Controls.Calendar>本身，或作为下拉列表的一部分，可以使用控件<xref:System.Windows.Controls.DatePicker>控件。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Calendar> supports only the Gregorian calendar.
The following table provides information about tasks that are typically associated with the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Calendar>.
trans-unit.target: 下表提供了有关通常与相关联的任务的信息<xref:System.Windows.Controls.Calendar>。

trans-unit.source: Have the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Calendar> display a month, an entire year, or a decade.
trans-unit.target: 具有<xref:System.Windows.Controls.Calendar>显示一个月、 整个年或十年。

trans-unit.source: Set the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Calendar.DisplayMode%2A> property to Month, Year, or Decade.
trans-unit.target: 设置<xref:System.Windows.Controls.Calendar.DisplayMode%2A>到月、 年或十年中的属性。

trans-unit.source: Specify whether the user can select a date, a range of dates, or multiple ranges of dates.
trans-unit.target: 指定用户是否可以选择一个日期、 的日期，范围或多个日期范围。

trans-unit.source: Specify dates that cannot be selected.
trans-unit.target: 指定日期，不能同时选择。

trans-unit.source: Specify the range of dates that the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Calendar> displays.
Specify whether the current date is highlighted.
trans-unit.target: 指定是否突出显示当前日期。

trans-unit.source: Use a <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Viewbox> or set the <xref:System.Windows.FrameworkElement.LayoutTransform%2A> property to a <xref:System.Windows.Media.ScaleTransform>.

Note that if you set the <xref:System.Windows.FrameworkElement.Width%2A> and <xref:System.Windows.FrameworkElement.Height%2A> properties of a <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Calendar>, the actual calendar does not change its size.
trans-unit.target: 请注意，如果你设置<xref:System.Windows.FrameworkElement.Width%2A>和<xref:System.Windows.FrameworkElement.Height%2A>属性<xref:System.Windows.Controls.Calendar>，则实际日历不会更改其大小。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Calendar> control provides basic navigation using either the mouse or keyboard.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Calendar>控件提供使用鼠标或键盘的基本导航。

trans-unit.source: The following table summarizes keyboard navigation.

Changes the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Calendar.SelectedDate%2A> property if the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Calendar.SelectionMode%2A> property is not set to <xref:System.Windows.Controls.CalendarSelectionMode.None>.
trans-unit.target: 更改<xref:System.Windows.Controls.Calendar.SelectedDate%2A>属性如果<xref:System.Windows.Controls.Calendar.SelectionMode%2A>属性未设置为<xref:System.Windows.Controls.CalendarSelectionMode.None>。

trans-unit.source: Changes the month of the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Calendar.DisplayDate%2A> property.
Note that the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Calendar.SelectedDate%2A> does not change.
Note that the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Calendar.SelectedDate%2A> does not change.

If <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Calendar.SelectionMode%2A> is not set to <xref:System.Windows.Controls.CalendarSelectionMode.SingleDate> or <xref:System.Windows.Controls.CalendarSelectionMode.None>, extends the range of selected dates.
trans-unit.target: 如果<xref:System.Windows.Controls.Calendar.SelectionMode%2A>未设置为<xref:System.Windows.Controls.CalendarSelectionMode.SingleDate>或<xref:System.Windows.Controls.CalendarSelectionMode.None>，扩展的所选日期范围。

trans-unit.source: Changes the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Calendar.SelectedDate%2A> to the first day of the current month.
Changes the month of the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Calendar.DisplayDate%2A> to the first month of the year.
Changes the year of the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Calendar.DisplayDate%2A> to the first year of the decade.
trans-unit.target: 更改的年份，该值<xref:System.Windows.Controls.Calendar.DisplayDate%2A>在十年的第一年。

trans-unit.source: Changes the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Calendar.SelectedDate%2A> to the last day of the current month.
trans-unit.target: 更改<xref:System.Windows.Controls.Calendar.SelectedDate%2A>与当前月份的最后一天。

trans-unit.source: Changes the month of the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Calendar.DisplayDate%2A> to the last month of the year.
trans-unit.target: 更改的月份<xref:System.Windows.Controls.Calendar.DisplayDate%2A>年份的最后一个月。

trans-unit.source: Changes the year of the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Calendar.DisplayDate%2A> to the last year of the decade.
trans-unit.target: 更改的年份，该值<xref:System.Windows.Controls.Calendar.DisplayDate%2A>十年中的最后一年。

trans-unit.source: Switches <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Calendar.DisplayMode%2A> to the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.CalendarMode.Month> or <xref:System.Windows.Controls.CalendarMode.Year> represented by focused item.
trans-unit.target: 交换机<xref:System.Windows.Controls.Calendar.DisplayMode%2A>到<xref:System.Windows.Controls.CalendarMode.Month>或<xref:System.Windows.Controls.CalendarMode.Year>由已设定焦点的项表示。

trans-unit.source: To apply the same property settings to multiple <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Calendar> controls, use the <xref:System.Windows.FrameworkElement.Style%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: 若要将相同的属性设置应用于多个<xref:System.Windows.Controls.Calendar>控件，使用<xref:System.Windows.FrameworkElement.Style%2A>属性。

trans-unit.source: You can modify the default <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ControlTemplate> to give the control a unique appearance.
trans-unit.target: 你可以修改默认<xref:System.Windows.Controls.ControlTemplate>提供独特外观的控件。

trans-unit.source: For more information about creating a <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ControlTemplate>, see [Customizing the Appearance of an Existing Control by Creating a ControlTemplate](~/docs/framework/wpf/controls/customizing-the-appearance-of-an-existing-control.md).
trans-unit.target: 有关创建<xref:System.Windows.Controls.ControlTemplate>，请参阅[通过创建 ControlTemplate 自定义现有的控件的外观](~/docs/framework/wpf/controls/customizing-the-appearance-of-an-existing-control.md)。

trans-unit.source: To see the parts and states that are specific to the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Calendar>, see [Calendar Styles and Templates](~/docs/framework/wpf/controls/calendar-styles-and-templates.md).
trans-unit.target: 若要查看的部件和特定于状态<xref:System.Windows.Controls.Calendar>，请参阅[日历样式和模板](~/docs/framework/wpf/controls/calendar-styles-and-templates.md)。

trans-unit.source: Dependency properties for this control might be set by the control’s default style.
trans-unit.target: 对于此控件的依赖项属性可能由控件的默认样式设置。

trans-unit.source: If a property is set by a default style, the property might change from its default value when the control appears in the application.
trans-unit.target: 如果属性设置的默认样式，该属性可能会更改从其默认值，如果控件出现在应用程序中。

trans-unit.source: The default style is determined by which desktop theme is used when the application is running.
trans-unit.target: 桌面主题用应用程序运行时确定的默认样式。
有关详细信息，请参阅[默认 WPF 主题](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=158252)。

trans-unit.source: Setting a visual property will only have an effect if that property is both present in <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Calendar> control's default template and is set by using a .
trans-unit.target: 设置 visual 属性会仅造成影响该属性是否都存在于<xref:System.Windows.Controls.Calendar>控件的默认模板，并通过设置。

trans-unit.source: You can find a list of visual properties in the "Changing the Visual Structure of a Control" section in [Customizing the Appearance of an Existing Control by Creating a ControlTemplate](~/docs/framework/wpf/controls/customizing-the-appearance-of-an-existing-control.md).
trans-unit.target: 可以在的"更改 Visual 结构的控件"一节中找到的可视属性列表[通过创建 ControlTemplate 自定义现有的控件的外观](~/docs/framework/wpf/controls/customizing-the-appearance-of-an-existing-control.md)。

trans-unit.source: The following illustration shows two <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Calendar> controls, one with selections and blackout dates and one without.
trans-unit.target: 下图显示了两个<xref:System.Windows.Controls.Calendar>控件，与中断日期，并选择一个，另一个没有。

trans-unit.source: The following code and XAML creates a page with two <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Calendar> controls that is similar to the previous illustration.
trans-unit.target: 下面的代码和 XAML 创建带有两个页面<xref:System.Windows.Controls.Calendar>类似于上图中的控件。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.Calendar" /> class.
trans-unit.target: 初始化 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.Calendar" /> 类的新实例。

trans-unit.source: Gets a collection of dates that are marked as not selectable.
trans-unit.target: 获取标记为不可选择的日期的集合。

trans-unit.source: A collection of dates that cannot be selected.
trans-unit.target: 不可选择的日期的集合。

trans-unit.source: The default value is an empty collection.
Dates in this collection will appear gray and crossed out on the calendar.
trans-unit.target: 此集合中的日期将显示为灰色并交叉出在日历上。

trans-unit.source: To make all past dates not selectable, you can use the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.CalendarBlackoutDatesCollection.AddDatesInPast%2A> method provided by the collection returned by this property.
trans-unit.target: 若要使过去的所有日期不可选，可以使用<xref:System.Windows.Controls.CalendarBlackoutDatesCollection.AddDatesInPast%2A>方法提供的此属性返回的集合。

trans-unit.source: One or more object elements of type <xref:System.Windows.Controls.CalendarDateRange>.
trans-unit.target: 类型的一个或多个对象元素<xref:System.Windows.Controls.CalendarDateRange>。

trans-unit.source: The following example creates a <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Calendar> that has some dates that cannot be selected.
trans-unit.target: 下面的示例创建<xref:System.Windows.Controls.Calendar>有无法选择某些日期。

trans-unit.source: The preceding example produces output that is similar to the following illustration.
trans-unit.target: 前面的示例生成类似于下图的输出。

trans-unit.source: ![Calendar with dates that cannot be selected.](~/add/media/ndp-calendarblackout.png "Calendar with dates that cannot be selected.")
trans-unit.target: ![不能选择的日期的日历。](~/add/media/ndp-calendarblackout.png "不能选择的日期的日历。")

trans-unit.source: Calendar with dates that cannot be selected
trans-unit.target: 不能选择的日期的日历

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Style" /> associated with the control's internal <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.CalendarButton" /> object.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置与控件的内部 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Style" /> 对象关联的 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.CalendarButton" />。

trans-unit.source: The current style of the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.CalendarButton" /> object.

trans-unit.target: 有关详细信息，请参阅 [XAML 资源](~/docs/framework/wpf/advanced/xaml-resources.md)。

trans-unit.source: The key that identifies the resource being requested.
trans-unit.target: 用于标识所请求的资源键。

trans-unit.source: The key refers to an existing resource in a <xref:System.Windows.ResourceDictionary>.
Gets or sets the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Style" /> associated with the control's internal <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.CalendarDayButton" /> object.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置与控件的内部 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Style" /> 对象关联的 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.CalendarDayButton" />。

trans-unit.source: The current style of the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.CalendarDayButton" /> object.

trans-unit.target: 有关详细信息，请参阅 [XAML 资源](~/docs/framework/wpf/advanced/xaml-resources.md)。

trans-unit.source: The key that identifies the resource being requested.
trans-unit.target: 用于标识所请求的资源键。

trans-unit.source: The key refers to an existing resource in a <xref:System.Windows.ResourceDictionary>.
Gets or sets the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Style" /> associated with the control's internal <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.CalendarItem" /> object.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置与控件的内部 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Style" /> 对象关联的 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.CalendarItem" />。

trans-unit.source: The current style of the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.CalendarItem" /> object.

trans-unit.target: 有关详细信息，请参阅 [XAML 资源](~/docs/framework/wpf/advanced/xaml-resources.md)。

trans-unit.source: The key that identifies the resource being requested.
trans-unit.target: 用于标识所请求的资源键。

trans-unit.source: The key refers to an existing resource in a <xref:System.Windows.ResourceDictionary>.
Gets or sets the date to display.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置要显示的日期。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Calendar.DisplayDate%2A> and <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Calendar.DisplayMode%2A> properties specify what the calendar displays and what has focus within the calendar.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Calendar.DisplayDate%2A>和<xref:System.Windows.Controls.Calendar.DisplayMode%2A>属性指定日历的显示和什么位于日历中具有焦点。

trans-unit.source: The user can change the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Calendar.SelectedDate%2A> only when <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Calendar.DisplayMode%2A> is set to Month, but the user might change the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Calendar.DisplayDate%2A> when the Calendar is in Year and Decade mode.
trans-unit.target: 用户可以更改<xref:System.Windows.Controls.Calendar.SelectedDate%2A>仅当<xref:System.Windows.Controls.Calendar.DisplayMode%2A>设为 Month，但用户可能会更改<xref:System.Windows.Controls.Calendar.DisplayDate%2A>日历时在年和十年模式下。

trans-unit.source: The following table describes how the mode changes the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Calendar.DisplayDate%2A>.
<xref:System.Windows.Controls.Calendar.DisplayDate%2A> changes when the user navigates to a different month.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Calendar.DisplayDate%2A> 当用户导航到不同的月份的更改。

trans-unit.source: The month of <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Calendar.DisplayDate%2A> changes when the user clicks or navigates to a different month.
trans-unit.target: 月<xref:System.Windows.Controls.Calendar.DisplayDate%2A>发生更改时用户单击或导航到不同的月份。

trans-unit.source: The year of <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Calendar.DisplayDate%2A> changes when the user clicks or navigates to another year.
trans-unit.target: 年份，该值<xref:System.Windows.Controls.Calendar.DisplayDate%2A>发生更改时用户单击或导航到另一年。

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Calendar.DisplayDate%2A> is ignored if its value is outside of the range of dates that is specified by <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Calendar.DisplayDateStart%2A> and <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Calendar.DisplayDateEnd%2A> properties.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Calendar.DisplayDate%2A> 如果其值是在范围内指定的日期，则忽略<xref:System.Windows.Controls.Calendar.DisplayDateStart%2A>和<xref:System.Windows.Controls.Calendar.DisplayDateEnd%2A>属性。

trans-unit.source: A date that is in one of the formats that are listed in the [DateTime XAML Syntax](~/docs/framework/wpf/advanced/datetime-xaml-syntax.md) topic.
trans-unit.target: 处于一种格式中列出的日期[DateTime XAML 语法](~/docs/framework/wpf/advanced/datetime-xaml-syntax.md)主题。

trans-unit.source: The following code sets up a <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Calendar> with a particular range of displayable dates, and sets the currently selected and displayed date.
trans-unit.target: 下面的代码将设置<xref:System.Windows.Controls.Calendar>与特定范围的可显示的日期，并设置当前选择和显示的日期。

trans-unit.source: Occurs when the <see cref="P:System.Windows.Controls.Calendar.DisplayDate" /> property is changed.
trans-unit.target: 当 <see cref="P:System.Windows.Controls.Calendar.DisplayDate" /> 属性更改时发生。

trans-unit.source: This event occurs after <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Calendar.DisplayDate%2A> is assigned its new value.
The following event handler updates a <xref:System.Windows.Controls.TextBox> with information from the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Calendar.DisplayDateChanged> event.
trans-unit.target: 以下事件处理程序更新<xref:System.Windows.Controls.TextBox>使用中的信息<xref:System.Windows.Controls.Calendar.DisplayDateChanged>事件。

trans-unit.source: This example is part of a larger example available in the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Calendar> overview.
trans-unit.target: 此示例摘自更大的示例中提供<xref:System.Windows.Controls.Calendar>概述。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the last date in the date range that is available in the calendar.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置日历中可用日期范围内的最后一个日期。

trans-unit.source: The last date that is available in the calendar.
trans-unit.target: 日历中最后一个可用日期。

trans-unit.source: You can restrict the range of a <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Calendar> by setting the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Calendar.DisplayDateStart%2A> and <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Calendar.DisplayDateEnd%2A> properties.
trans-unit.target: 你可以限制的范围<xref:System.Windows.Controls.Calendar>通过设置<xref:System.Windows.Controls.Calendar.DisplayDateStart%2A>和<xref:System.Windows.Controls.Calendar.DisplayDateEnd%2A>属性。

trans-unit.source: A user cannot scroll to or select dates outside of this range.
trans-unit.target: 用户不能向下滚动到或选择在此范围之外的日期。

trans-unit.source: If you set the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Calendar.SelectedDate%2A> property to a date that is after <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Calendar.DisplayDateEnd%2A>, <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Calendar.DisplayDateEnd%2A> is set to the same value as <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Calendar.SelectedDate%2A>.
trans-unit.target: 如果你设置<xref:System.Windows.Controls.Calendar.SelectedDate%2A>属性后，将日期<xref:System.Windows.Controls.Calendar.DisplayDateEnd%2A>，<xref:System.Windows.Controls.Calendar.DisplayDateEnd%2A>设置为相同的值<xref:System.Windows.Controls.Calendar.SelectedDate%2A>。

trans-unit.source: A date that is in one of the formats that are listed in the [DateTime XAML Syntax](~/docs/framework/wpf/advanced/datetime-xaml-syntax.md) topic.
trans-unit.target: 处于一种格式中列出的日期[DateTime XAML 语法](~/docs/framework/wpf/advanced/datetime-xaml-syntax.md)主题。

trans-unit.source: The following code sets up a <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Calendar> with a particular range of displayable dates, and sets the currently selected and displayed date.
trans-unit.target: 下面的代码将设置<xref:System.Windows.Controls.Calendar>与特定范围的可显示的日期，并设置当前选择和显示的日期。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the first date that is available in the calendar.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置日历中第一个可用的日期。

trans-unit.source: The first date that is available in the calendar.
trans-unit.target: 日历中第一个可用的日期。

trans-unit.source: You can restrict the range of a Calendar by setting the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Calendar.DisplayDateStart%2A> and <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Calendar.DisplayDateEnd%2A> properties.
trans-unit.target: 你可以通过设置限制的日历范围<xref:System.Windows.Controls.Calendar.DisplayDateStart%2A>和<xref:System.Windows.Controls.Calendar.DisplayDateEnd%2A>属性。

trans-unit.source: A user cannot scroll to or select dates outside of this range.
trans-unit.target: 用户不能向下滚动到或选择在此范围之外的日期。

trans-unit.source: If you set the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Calendar.SelectedDate%2A> property to a date that is before <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Calendar.DisplayDateStart%2A>, <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Calendar.DisplayDateStart%2A> is set to the same value as <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Calendar.SelectedDate%2A>.
trans-unit.target: 如果你设置<xref:System.Windows.Controls.Calendar.SelectedDate%2A>到之前的日期属性<xref:System.Windows.Controls.Calendar.DisplayDateStart%2A>，<xref:System.Windows.Controls.Calendar.DisplayDateStart%2A>设置为相同的值<xref:System.Windows.Controls.Calendar.SelectedDate%2A>。

trans-unit.source: A date that is in one of the formats that are listed in the [DateTime XAML Syntax](~/docs/framework/wpf/advanced/datetime-xaml-syntax.md) topic.
trans-unit.target: 处于一种格式中列出的日期[DateTime XAML 语法](~/docs/framework/wpf/advanced/datetime-xaml-syntax.md)主题。

trans-unit.source: The following code sets up a <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Calendar> with a particular range of displayable dates, and sets the currently selected and displayed date.
trans-unit.target: 下面的代码将设置<xref:System.Windows.Controls.Calendar>与特定范围的可显示的日期，并设置当前选择和显示的日期。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a value that indicates whether the calendar displays a month, year, or decade.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置一个值，该值指示日历是显示月份、年份还是十年期。

trans-unit.source: A value that indicates what length of time the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.Calendar" /> should display.
trans-unit.target: 一个指示 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.Calendar" /> 应显示的时间长度的值。

trans-unit.source: A Calendar can display a month, a year, or a decade.
trans-unit.target: 一个月、 年、 或十年，可以显示日历。

trans-unit.source: The following table lists how the user navigates to each mode.
trans-unit.target: 下表列出了用户如何导航到每种模式。

trans-unit.source: To navigate to Year mode, click the month heading.
trans-unit.target: 若要导航到年份模式下，单击月标题。

trans-unit.source: To navigate to Decade mode, click the year heading.
trans-unit.target: 要导航到十年模式下，请单击年标题。

trans-unit.source: To navigate to Month mode, click one of the displayed months.
trans-unit.target: 若要导航到月份模式下，单击显示的月份之一。

trans-unit.source: To navigate to Year mode, click one of the displayed years.
trans-unit.target: 若要导航到年份模式下，单击显示的年份之一。

trans-unit.source: The following example creates a calendar that displays the months in a year and handles the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Calendar.DisplayModeChanged> event so that when the user clicks on a month or the year, the calendar does not change its <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Calendar.DisplayMode%2A>.
trans-unit.target: 下面的示例创建一个显示月份中每一年和句柄的日历<xref:System.Windows.Controls.Calendar.DisplayModeChanged>事件，以便当用户单击在上一个月或年，日历不会更改其<xref:System.Windows.Controls.Calendar.DisplayMode%2A>。

trans-unit.source: Occurs when the <see cref="P:System.Windows.Controls.Calendar.DisplayMode" /> property is changed.
trans-unit.target: 当 <see cref="P:System.Windows.Controls.Calendar.DisplayMode" /> 属性更改时发生。

trans-unit.source: The following example creates a calendar that displays the months in a year and handles the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Calendar.DisplayModeChanged> event so that when the user clicks on a month or the year, the calendar does not change its <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Calendar.DisplayMode%2A>.
trans-unit.target: 下面的示例创建一个显示月份中每一年和句柄的日历<xref:System.Windows.Controls.Calendar.DisplayModeChanged>事件，以便当用户单击在上一个月或年，日历不会更改其<xref:System.Windows.Controls.Calendar.DisplayMode%2A>。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the day that is considered the beginning of the week.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置被视为一周开始的日期。

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.DayOfWeek" /> that represents the beginning of the week.
The default is the <see cref="P:System.Globalization.DateTimeFormatInfo.FirstDayOfWeek" /> that is determined by the current culture.
trans-unit.target: 默认值为由当前区域性确定的 <see cref="P:System.Globalization.DateTimeFormatInfo.FirstDayOfWeek" />。

trans-unit.source: The following example sets the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Calendar.FirstDayOfWeek%2A> property to <xref:System.DayOfWeek.Monday>.
Gets or sets a value that indicates whether the current date is highlighted.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置一个值，该值指示是否将突出显示当前日期。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> if the current date is highlighted; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: 如果突出显示当前日期，则为 <see langword="true" />；否则为 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: The following example creates a <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Calendar> where the current date is not highlighted.
trans-unit.target: 下面的示例创建<xref:System.Windows.Controls.Calendar>其中的当前日期未突出显示。

trans-unit.source: Builds the visual tree for the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.Calendar" /> control when a new template is applied.
trans-unit.target: 当应用新模板时生成 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.Calendar" /> 控件的可视化树。

trans-unit.source: This method is invoked whenever application code or an internal process, such as rebuilding layout pass, calls the <xref:System.Windows.FrameworkElement.ApplyTemplate%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: 每当应用程序代码或内部进程，如重新生成布局处理过程的处理调用，会调用此方法<xref:System.Windows.FrameworkElement.ApplyTemplate%2A>方法。

trans-unit.source: Returns a <see cref="T:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.CalendarAutomationPeer" /> for use by the [!INCLUDE[silverlight](~/includes/silverlight-md.md)] automation infrastructure.
trans-unit.target: 返回一个 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.CalendarAutomationPeer" />，供 [!INCLUDE[silverlight](~/includes/silverlight-md.md)] 自动化基础结构使用。

trans-unit.source: This method creates a new <xref:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.CalendarAutomationPeer> instance if one has not been created for the control instance; otherwise, it returns the <xref:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.CalendarAutomationPeer> previously created.
trans-unit.target: 此方法创建一个新<xref:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.CalendarAutomationPeer>尚未为控件实例创建如果一个实例; 否则，它将返回<xref:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.CalendarAutomationPeer>以前创建的。

trans-unit.source: When overriding <see cref="M:System.Windows.Controls.Calendar.OnDisplayDateChanged(System.Windows.Controls.CalendarDateChangedEventArgs)" /> in a derived class, be sure to call the base class’s <see cref="M:System.Windows.Controls.Calendar.OnDisplayDateChanged(System.Windows.Controls.CalendarDateChangedEventArgs)" /> method so that registered delegates receive the event.
trans-unit.target: 在重写<see cref="M:System.Windows.Controls.Calendar.OnDisplayDateChanged(System.Windows.Controls.CalendarDateChangedEventArgs)" />在派生类中，一定要调用基类的<see cref="M:System.Windows.Controls.Calendar.OnDisplayDateChanged(System.Windows.Controls.CalendarDateChangedEventArgs)" />方法，以便已注册的委托对事件进行接收。

trans-unit.source: When overriding <see cref="M:System.Windows.Controls.Calendar.OnDisplayModeChanged(System.Windows.Controls.CalendarModeChangedEventArgs)" /> in a derived class, be sure to call the base class’s <see cref="M:System.Windows.Controls.Calendar.OnDisplayModeChanged(System.Windows.Controls.CalendarModeChangedEventArgs)" /> method so that registered delegates receive the event.
trans-unit.target: 在重写<see cref="M:System.Windows.Controls.Calendar.OnDisplayModeChanged(System.Windows.Controls.CalendarModeChangedEventArgs)" />在派生类中，一定要调用基类的<see cref="M:System.Windows.Controls.Calendar.OnDisplayModeChanged(System.Windows.Controls.CalendarModeChangedEventArgs)" />方法，以便已注册的委托对事件进行接收。

trans-unit.source: Provides class handling for the <see cref="E:System.Windows.UIElement.KeyDown" /> routed event that occurs when the user presses a key while this control has focus.
trans-unit.target: 为在此控件有焦点的情况下用户按任意键时发生的 <see cref="E:System.Windows.UIElement.KeyDown" /> 路由事件提供类处理。

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Calendar> overrides the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Calendar.OnKeyDown%2A> method to support keyboard navigation.
For more information, see the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Calendar> class.
trans-unit.target: 有关更多信息，请参见 <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Calendar> 类。

trans-unit.source: This implementation marks the <xref:System.Windows.UIElement.KeyDown> event as handled by setting the <xref:System.Windows.RoutedEventArgs.Handled%2A> property of the event data to `true` when a keystroke, such as pressing an ARROW key, performs a navigation action.
trans-unit.target: 此实现将标记<xref:System.Windows.UIElement.KeyDown>事件处理的设置<xref:System.Windows.RoutedEventArgs.Handled%2A>属性的事件数据的`true`击键，如按箭头键，当执行导航操作。

trans-unit.source: If you override <see cref="M:System.Windows.Controls.Calendar.OnKeyDown(System.Windows.Input.KeyEventArgs)" />, always call the base implementation in your <see cref="M:System.Windows.Controls.Calendar.OnKeyDown(System.Windows.Input.KeyEventArgs)" /> implementation.
trans-unit.target: 如果你重写<see cref="M:System.Windows.Controls.Calendar.OnKeyDown(System.Windows.Input.KeyEventArgs)" />，始终调用基实现你<see cref="M:System.Windows.Controls.Calendar.OnKeyDown(System.Windows.Input.KeyEventArgs)" />实现。

trans-unit.source: Failure to call the base implementation prevents base classes from handling the event with a class handler, which might change the run-time behavior of the final class.
trans-unit.target: 如果调用基实现会使基类处理具有类处理程序，这可能会改变最终类的运行时行为的事件。

trans-unit.source: You can call the base implementation either before or after your special handling, depending on your requirements.
trans-unit.target: 你可以调用基实现之前或之后你特殊的处理，具体取决于你的要求。

trans-unit.source: Provides class handling for the <see cref="E:System.Windows.UIElement.KeyUp" /> routed event that occurs when the user releases a key while this control has focus.
trans-unit.target: 为在此控件有焦点的情况下用户释放任意键时发生的 <see cref="E:System.Windows.UIElement.KeyUp" /> 路由事件提供类处理。

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Calendar> overrides the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Calendar.OnKeyDown%2A> method to support keyboard navigation.
For more information, see the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Calendar> class.
trans-unit.target: 有关更多信息，请参见 <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Calendar> 类。

trans-unit.source: This implementation does not change the handled state (the <xref:System.Windows.RoutedEventArgs.Handled%2A> property) of the <xref:System.Windows.UIElement.KeyUp> event data.
trans-unit.target: 此实现不会更改已处理的状态 (<xref:System.Windows.RoutedEventArgs.Handled%2A>属性) 的<xref:System.Windows.UIElement.KeyUp>事件数据。

trans-unit.source: If you override <see cref="M:System.Windows.Controls.Calendar.OnKeyUp(System.Windows.Input.KeyEventArgs)" />, always call the base implementation in your <see cref="M:System.Windows.Controls.Calendar.OnKeyUp(System.Windows.Input.KeyEventArgs)" /> implementation.
trans-unit.target: 如果你重写<see cref="M:System.Windows.Controls.Calendar.OnKeyUp(System.Windows.Input.KeyEventArgs)" />，始终调用基实现你<see cref="M:System.Windows.Controls.Calendar.OnKeyUp(System.Windows.Input.KeyEventArgs)" />实现。

trans-unit.source: Failure to call the base implementation prevents base classes from handling the event with a class handler, which might change the run-time behavior of the final class.
trans-unit.target: 如果调用基实现会使基类处理具有类处理程序，这可能会改变最终类的运行时行为的事件。

trans-unit.source: You can call the base implementation either before or after your special handling, depending on your requirements.
trans-unit.target: 你可以调用基实现之前或之后你特殊的处理，具体取决于你的要求。

trans-unit.source: The control raises the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Calendar.SelectedDatesChanged> event by calling <xref:System.Windows.UIElement.RaiseEvent%2A>.
trans-unit.target: 该控件将引发<xref:System.Windows.Controls.Calendar.SelectedDatesChanged>通过调用的事件<xref:System.Windows.UIElement.RaiseEvent%2A>。
有关详细信息，请参阅[路由事件概述](~/docs/framework/wpf/advanced/routed-events-overview.md)。

trans-unit.source: When overriding <see cref="M:System.Windows.Controls.Calendar.OnSelectedDatesChanged(System.Windows.Controls.SelectionChangedEventArgs)" /> in a derived class, be sure to call the base class’s <see cref="M:System.Windows.Controls.Calendar.OnSelectedDatesChanged(System.Windows.Controls.SelectionChangedEventArgs)" /> method so that registered delegates receive the event.
trans-unit.target: 在重写<see cref="M:System.Windows.Controls.Calendar.OnSelectedDatesChanged(System.Windows.Controls.SelectionChangedEventArgs)" />在派生类中，一定要调用基类的<see cref="M:System.Windows.Controls.Calendar.OnSelectedDatesChanged(System.Windows.Controls.SelectionChangedEventArgs)" />方法，以便已注册的委托对事件进行接收。

trans-unit.source: When overriding <see cref="M:System.Windows.Controls.Calendar.OnSelectionModeChanged(System.EventArgs)" /> in a derived class, be sure to call the base class’s <see cref="M:System.Windows.Controls.Calendar.OnSelectionModeChanged(System.EventArgs)" /> method so that registered delegates receive the event.
trans-unit.target: 在重写<see cref="M:System.Windows.Controls.Calendar.OnSelectionModeChanged(System.EventArgs)" />在派生类中，一定要调用基类的<see cref="M:System.Windows.Controls.Calendar.OnSelectionModeChanged(System.EventArgs)" />方法，以便已注册的委托对事件进行接收。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the currently selected date.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置当前选定的日期。

trans-unit.source: Use this property when <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Calendar.SelectionMode%2A> is set to <xref:System.Windows.Controls.CalendarSelectionMode.SingleDate>.
In other modes, this property will always be the first date in <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Calendar.SelectedDates%2A>.
trans-unit.target: 在其他模式下，此属性将始终为中的第一个日期<xref:System.Windows.Controls.Calendar.SelectedDates%2A>。

trans-unit.source: A date that is in one of the formats that are listed in the [DateTime XAML Syntax](~/docs/framework/wpf/advanced/datetime-xaml-syntax.md) topic.
trans-unit.target: 处于一种格式中列出的日期[DateTime XAML 语法](~/docs/framework/wpf/advanced/datetime-xaml-syntax.md)主题。

trans-unit.source: The following example creates a <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Calendar> with a particular range of displayable dates, and sets the currently selected and displayed date.
trans-unit.target: 下面的示例创建<xref:System.Windows.Controls.Calendar>与特定范围的可显示的日期，并设置当前选择和显示的日期。

trans-unit.source: The specified date is outside the range specified by <see cref="P:System.Windows.Controls.Calendar.DisplayDateStart" /> and <see cref="P:System.Windows.Controls.Calendar.DisplayDateEnd" />
trans-unit.target: 指定的日期不在由 <see cref="P:System.Windows.Controls.Calendar.DisplayDateStart" /> 和 <see cref="P:System.Windows.Controls.Calendar.DisplayDateEnd" /> 指定的范围内

trans-unit.source: The specified date is in the <see cref="P:System.Windows.Controls.Calendar.BlackoutDates" /> collection.
trans-unit.target: 指定日期位于 <see cref="P:System.Windows.Controls.Calendar.BlackoutDates" /> 集合中。

trans-unit.source: If set to anything other than <see langword="null" /> when <see cref="P:System.Windows.Controls.Calendar.SelectionMode" /> is set to <see cref="F:System.Windows.Controls.CalendarSelectionMode.None" />.
trans-unit.target: 如果设置为 <see langword="null" /> 之外的任何值（此时 <see cref="P:System.Windows.Controls.Calendar.SelectionMode" /> 设置为 <see cref="F:System.Windows.Controls.CalendarSelectionMode.None" />）。

trans-unit.source: Gets a collection of selected dates.
A <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.SelectedDatesCollection" /> object that contains the currently selected dates.
trans-unit.target: 包含当前选定日期的 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.SelectedDatesCollection" /> 对象。

trans-unit.source: The default is an empty collection.
Dates can be added to the collection either individually or in a range using the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.SelectedDatesCollection.AddRange%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: 日期可以在单独或在范围中使用添加到集合<xref:System.Windows.Controls.SelectedDatesCollection.AddRange%2A>方法。

trans-unit.source: Depending on the value of the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Calendar.SelectionMode%2A> property, adding a date or range to the collection may cause it to be cleared.
trans-unit.target: 根据值<xref:System.Windows.Controls.Calendar.SelectionMode%2A>属性，将日期或范围添加到集合可能导致其被清除。

trans-unit.source: The following table lists how <xref:System.Windows.Controls.CalendarSelectionMode> affects the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Calendar.SelectedDates%2A> property.
<xref:System.Windows.Controls.Calendar.SelectedDate%2A> cannot be set and no values can be added to <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Calendar.SelectedDates%2A>.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Calendar.SelectedDate%2A> 无法设置并没有值可以添加到<xref:System.Windows.Controls.Calendar.SelectedDates%2A>。

trans-unit.source: Only a single date can be selected, either by setting <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Calendar.SelectedDate%2A> or the first value in <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Calendar.SelectedDates%2A>.
trans-unit.target: 可以选择单个日期，通过设置<xref:System.Windows.Controls.Calendar.SelectedDate%2A>或中的第一个值<xref:System.Windows.Controls.Calendar.SelectedDates%2A>。

trans-unit.source: A single range of dates can be selected.
trans-unit.target: 只能选择一个日期范围。

trans-unit.source: Setting <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Calendar.SelectedDate%2A>, adding a date individually to <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Calendar.SelectedDates%2A>, or using <xref:System.Windows.Controls.SelectedDatesCollection.AddRange%2A> will clear all previous values from <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Calendar.SelectedDates%2A>.
trans-unit.target: 设置<xref:System.Windows.Controls.Calendar.SelectedDate%2A>，单独向中添加日期<xref:System.Windows.Controls.Calendar.SelectedDates%2A>，或使用<xref:System.Windows.Controls.SelectedDatesCollection.AddRange%2A>将清除所有以前的值从<xref:System.Windows.Controls.Calendar.SelectedDates%2A>。

trans-unit.source: Multiple non-contiguous ranges of dates can be selected.
trans-unit.target: 可以选择多个非连续范围的日期。

trans-unit.source: Adding a date individually to <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Calendar.SelectedDates%2A> or using <xref:System.Windows.Controls.SelectedDatesCollection.AddRange%2A> will not clear <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Calendar.SelectedDates%2A>.
trans-unit.target: 单独向中添加日期<xref:System.Windows.Controls.Calendar.SelectedDates%2A>或使用<xref:System.Windows.Controls.SelectedDatesCollection.AddRange%2A>不会清除<xref:System.Windows.Controls.Calendar.SelectedDates%2A>。

trans-unit.source: Setting <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Calendar.SelectedDate%2A> will still clear <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Calendar.SelectedDates%2A>, but additional dates or ranges can then be added.
trans-unit.target: 设置<xref:System.Windows.Controls.Calendar.SelectedDate%2A>仍将清除<xref:System.Windows.Controls.Calendar.SelectedDates%2A>，但然后可以添加其他日期或范围。

trans-unit.source: Adding a range that includes some dates that are already selected or overlaps with another range results in the union of the ranges and does not cause an exception.
trans-unit.target: 添加包括某些已选中或与另一个联合中的范围的范围结果重叠，不会导致异常的日期范围。

trans-unit.source: The following example creates a <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Calendar> that has multiple ranges of dates selected.
trans-unit.target: 下面的示例创建<xref:System.Windows.Controls.Calendar>具有多个所选日期范围。

trans-unit.source: Occurs when the collection returned by the <see cref="P:System.Windows.Controls.Calendar.SelectedDates" /> property is changed.
trans-unit.target: 在更改由 <see cref="P:System.Windows.Controls.Calendar.SelectedDates" /> 属性返回的集合时发生。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a value that indicates what kind of selections are allowed.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置一个值，该值指示允许哪种类型的选择。

trans-unit.source: A value that indicates the current selection mode.
trans-unit.target: 指示当前选择模式的值。

trans-unit.source: This property determines whether the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Calendar> allows no selection, selection of a single date, or selection of multiple dates.
trans-unit.target: 此属性确定是否<xref:System.Windows.Controls.Calendar>允许没有选定内容、 选择一个日期或选择多个日期。

trans-unit.source: The selection mode is specified with the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.CalendarSelectionMode> enumeration.
When this property is changed, all selected dates will be cleared.
trans-unit.target: 此属性更改时，将清除所有选定的日期。

trans-unit.source: The following example creates a <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Calendar> that has multiple ranges of dates selected.
trans-unit.target: 下面的示例创建<xref:System.Windows.Controls.Calendar>具有多个所选日期范围。

trans-unit.source: Provides a text representation of the selected date.
trans-unit.target: 提供选定日期的文本表示形式。

trans-unit.source: A text representation of the selected date, or an empty string if <see cref="P:System.Windows.Controls.Calendar.SelectedDate" /> is <see langword="null" />.
trans-unit.target: 选定日期的文本表示形式，或者，如果 <see cref="P:System.Windows.Controls.Calendar.SelectedDate" /> 为 <see langword="null" />，则为空字符串。
